2025-10-29.content: Agent Assist offers [summarization with custom sections 5.0](https://docs.cloud.google.com/agent-assist/docs/summarization-with-custom-sections) in GA. 5.0 is available in all Agent Assist [regions](https://docs.cloud.google.com/agent-assist/docs/regionalization).

summary.title: Agent Assist Now Offers Summarization with Custom Sections 5.0 in General Availability
summary.summary: Agent Assist has officially launched summarization with custom sections 5.0, now available in all its supported regions. This feature enhances the summarization capabilities for users.

2025-10-20.content:
Agent Assist offers summarization automatic evaluation in GA. This feature assesses the quality of AI-generated summaries based on accuracy, completeness, and adherence. [Summarization autoevaluation](https://docs.cloud.google.com/agent-assist/docs/summarization-autoeval-metrics) is available in the following regions:

* us-central1
* us-west1
* global

summary.title: Agent Assist Summarization Autoevaluation Now in GA
summary.summary: Agent Assist's new feature provides automatic evaluation of AI-generated summaries, assessing quality based on accuracy, completeness, and adherence. This capability is now generally available.

2025-10-09.content: Agent Assist offers [AI coach](https://docs.cloud.google.com/agent-assist/docs/ai-coach-overview) in GA. AI coach automatically suggests responses to an agent during a customer service conversation. AI coach is available in all Google Cloud [languages](https://docs.cloud.google.com/agent-assist/docs/languages) and [regions](https://docs.cloud.google.com/agent-assist/docs/regionalization).

summary.title: AI coach is now Generally Available
summary.summary: Agent Assist now offers AI coach in General Availability. This feature provides automatic response suggestions to agents during customer service conversations and is available in all Google Cloud languages and regions.

2025-10-09.content: [OpenAPI and Integration Connectors tools](https://docs.cloud.google.com/agent-assist/docs/tools) are generally available in Agent Assist. Google Cloud enables the use of this external API and data source to improve Agent Assist integrations.

summary.title: OpenAPI and Integration Connectors are Generally Available
summary.summary: OpenAPI and Integration Connectors tools are now generally available in Agent Assist. This allows for the use of external APIs and data sources to enhance Agent Assist integrations.

2025-10-09.content:
Agent Assist offers the following functions in addition to [generative knowledge assist](https://docs.cloud.google.com/agent-assist/docs/generative-knowledge-assist) features:

* Apply [document and safety filters](https://docs.cloud.google.com/agent-assist/docs/ka-filters).
* [Configure Pub/Sub notifications](https://docs.cloud.google.com/agent-assist/docs/pubsub-notifications) for empty suggestions.
* [Troubleshoot knowledge assist features](https://docs.cloud.google.com/agent-assist/docs/troubleshoot-ka).

summary.title: Agent Assist New Features
summary.summary: Explore the latest enhancements to Agent Assist, including document and safety filters, Pub/Sub notifications for empty suggestions, and troubleshooting for knowledge assist features.

2025-10-01.content: [Smart compose](https://docs.cloud.google.com/agent-assist/priv/docs/smart-compose) is no longer in use and will be permanently removed in October 2025. Refer to [Generative smart reply](https://docs.cloud.google.com/agent-assist/priv/docs/generative-smart-reply) for an alternative.

summary.title: Smart compose deprecated
summary.summary: Smart compose is deprecated and will be removed in October 2025. Consider using generative smart reply as an alternative.

2025-10-21.content:
Agent Assist offers summarization automatic evaluation in GA. This feature evaluates the quality of AI-generated summaries based on accuracy, completeness, and adherence. [Summarization autoevaluation](https://cloud.google.com/agent-assist/docs/summarization-autoeval-metrics) is available in the following regions:

* `us-central1`
* `us-west1`
* `global`

summary.title: Agent Assist Automatic Summarization Evaluation Now in GA
summary.summary: Agent Assist now offers automatic summarization evaluation in General Availability. This feature assesses the quality of AI-generated summaries for accuracy, completeness, and adherence, with support in us-central1, us-west1, and global regions.

2025-09-23.content: Agent Assist offers a bidirectional API for next-generation audio and multi-modal experiences in both Conversational Agents and Agent Assist. The [`BiDiStreamingAnalyzeContent` API](https://cloud.google.com/agent-assist/docs/bidi-stream-api) facilitates the streaming of audio data and returns either transcripts or human agent suggestions to you.

summary.title: Agent Assist API
summary.summary: A new bidirectional API is available for Agent Assist that supports audio and multi-modal features.

2025-09-09.content:
Agent assist offers [summarization automatic evaluation](https://cloud.google.com/agent-assist/docs/summarization-autoeval-guide) in preview. This feature evaluates the quality of AI-generated summaries based on the following three metrics:

* Accuracy
* Completeness
* Adherence

summary.title: Agent assist summarization evaluation
summary.summary: Agent assist now offers summarization evaluation in preview, assessing AI-generated summaries on accuracy, completeness, and adherence.

2025-08-21.content: [**Article suggestion**](https://cloud.google.com/agent-assist/docs/article-suggestion) and [**FAQ Assist**](https://cloud.google.com/agent-assist/docs/faq) are no longer in use and you can't create new conversation profiles for them. These two features will be permanently removed on March 1, 2026. Refer to [Generative knowledge assist](https://cloud.google.com/agent-assist/docs/generative-knowledge-assist) for an alternative.

summary.title: Deprecated Features
summary.summary: Article suggestion and FAQ Assist are deprecated. They will be removed on March 1, 2026. Generative knowledge assist is the alternative.

2025-07-28.content: Agent Assist offers the **[Twilio UI module V3](https://cloud.google.com/agent-assist/docs/twilio)**. This version provides an upgraded integration.

summary.title: Twilio UI module V3 Upgrade
summary.summary: This is a short summary for a title.

2025-07-11.content: Google Cloud provides **quotas** for using Agent Assist APIs. Each feature uses specific APIs, which have their own [quotas](https://cloud.google.com/agent-assist/docs/quotas).

2025-06-13.content: Agent Assist offers **Summarization with custom sections V4.0** in GA. [V4.0](https://cloud.google.com/agent-assist/docs/summarization-with-custom-sections) uses gemini-2.0-flash and supports a concise summary for situation and action.

summary.title: New Feature: Agent Assist Summarization
summary.summary: Agent Assist now supports summarization with custom sections V4.0 in GA.
